main.docTitle: Merchant Shipping (Prevention and Control of Pollution) (Specification of Substances) Order

subsection.content: This Order may be cited as the Merchant Shipping (Prevention and Control of Pollution) (Specification of Substances) Order. (E.R. 1 of 2021)

section.name: s1A
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: 2002 IMDG Code (《2002年國際海運危險貨物規則》) means the 2002 edition of the International Maritime Dangerous Goods Code published by IMO;
Consolidated Edition 2002 (《2002年綜合版》) means the publication published by IMO entitled “MARPOL 73/78 Consolidated Edition, 2002” ;
IMO means the International Maritime Organization;
MARPOL 73/78 (《73/78年防污公約》) means the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, 1973, as modified by the Protocol of 1978 relating thereto;
MEPC.2/Circ.9 (《MEPC.2/9號通函》) means the circular issued by IMO bearing “MEPC.2/Circ.9” as its reference number, as modified by IMO on 23 January 2004.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Specification of substances
section.leadIn: A substance on board a ship is a substance other than oil for the purposes of paragraph (a) of the definition of any substance other than oil in section 6(9) of the Ordinance if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: it is a substance specified in the Schedule; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: it is carried on board the ship as cargo, or it is the residue of a quantity of the same substance previously carried on board the ship.

section.name: s1
section.leadIn: Noxious liquid substances, as defined in Annex II to MARPOL 73/78 as contained in the Consolidated Edition 2002, when carried in bulk, and—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: categorized or provisionally categorized as Category A or B in—

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: Lists 1 to 4 attached to MEPC.2/Circ.9; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: identified in the list attached to BLG/Circ.13 with—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: “2”, “(2)”, “2/BOD” or “2/D” in column B, and “XX” in column E, of the list; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: “XXX” in column E of the list.

section.name: s2
section.leadIn: Harmful substances in packaged form, as defined in Annex III to MARPOL 73/78 as contained in the Consolidated Edition 2002, which—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: are identified as severe marine pollutants with “PP” in column “MP” of the Index to the 2002 IMDG Code; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: meet the criteria for severe marine pollutants as specified in paragraph 2.10.4.1.2 of the Code.

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: Radioactive materials, as defined in paragraph 2.7.1 of the 2002 IMDG Code, which are transported—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in type B(U) or type B(M) packages as specified in paragraph 2.7.7.1.5 of the Code;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in type C packages as specified in paragraph 2.7.7.1.6 of the Code;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: as fissile materials as defined in paragraph 2.7.2 of the Code; or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: under special arrangements as specified in paragraph 7.1.14.10 of the Code.

section.name: s4
section.content: Liquefied gases, identified in Chapter 19 of the 1993 IGC Code, when carried in bulk.
